ImageMagick WebGUI is a modern, user-friendly web interface for ImageMagick, offering a wide range of image manipulation tools and AI-powered features like background removal and auto-enhancement. It provides a real-time preview and supports batch processing, making it suitable for both casual users and power users via a terminal mode.
